attributes.action: Go back and empty general waste bins every 2 weeks
attributes.additional_details: Change it to every two weeks
attributes.background: Empty bins every two weeks instead of 3 and 4 weeks now refusing to empty if bins are too heavy of course they will be heavy if emptied every 3 weeks and if bin is too heavy wont be emptied

rejection.details:
Decisions about local waste collection are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
